attributes.action: Force TV Manufacturers to install Freeview Digital Tuners into ALL TV's from now on
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been known for some years that analogue TV signals are going to be superseeded by digital transmissions and yet TV manufacturers are allowed to sell the public TV's that will be obsolete within a very short time. The manufacturers and Government expect everyone to buy digital boxes at extra cost. There should be legislation in place to protect the consumer and now not in 6 months time!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
